data.title: Sparsh Stories
data.description: I love to write. Sparsh stories is a place where I share my writing which is inpsired by real life.
data.problem: nothing much, as I like to write, I am wondering, where I can share it.
data.solution: Except social media, I don't know where to share.
data.usp: As every one is unique in their own way, I am sharing my views on how I see the world.

currentlyLookingFor.title: FEEDBACK
currentlyLookingFor.value: I want the honest feedback about my ideas, it is really worth it.
